actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Veterans.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to provide for the payment to States of per diem for veterans who receive adult day health care through State homes, and to authorize the provision of assistance to States for the construction of adult day health care facilities at State homes.
subjects: Day care centers for the aged

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to pay each State a per diem rate for each veteran receiving adult day health care in a State home. Includes the construction of adult day health care facilities in the authorized use of funds under a program authorizing the Secretary to provide grants to States for the construction of State veterans' nursing home or hospital care facilities.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to provide for the payment to States of per diem for veterans who receive adult day health care through State homes, and to authorize the provision of assistance to States for the construction of adult day health care facilities at State homes.
